sentences.sentence: The LORD said, "Take a heifer with you and say, 'I have come to sacrifice to the LORD."'
sentences.translation: 耶和华说：“你可以带一只牛犊去，就说：‘我来是要向耶和华献祭。”’

sentences.sentence: The priest is to take some cedar wood, hyssop and scarlet wool and throw them onto the burning heifer.
sentences.translation: 祭司要把香柏木，牛膝草，朱红色线都丢在烧牛的火中。

sentences.sentence: The unlucky heifer was exploring the drum of a fly-tipped washing machine when its head became trapped.
sentences.translation: 这只小母牛在“探究”洗衣机的圆桶时不幸地把头卡在了里面。
